tag_list: austrian, vienna, seattle, microsoft, product-planner, twentypeople, founder, ceo
overview:
Roman is a book author, former Product Planner at Microsoft and CEO at TwentyPeople.com.

With a team, Roman is responsible for the biggest real-life alternate-reality event in Vienna, Austria: TheViennaProject.com.

From 2006 to 2011, he also served as co-founder and executive at the Austrian car-pooling social network DRIVETOGETHER.AT.

He worked in New York, London, Vienna, Seattle as a consultant, web-designer, software-developer, radio journalist, marketing associate and product manager.

Roman was named among Austria’s Top 6 High Potentials in 2007 and Top 30 in 2005 and became one of the three founding members of the High Potential Alumni Club, Vienna. His work has been featured in national and international newspapers and magazines and on national TV. Roman regularly works as a voice-over for mostly national corporations.

degrees.subject: Business Administration
degrees.institution: Vienna University of Economics and Business Administration
